snippet: Steve Nechelput, a British finance executive, has not been detained or prevented from traveling or working in China, but a person involved in the case says he is prohibited from leaving the country.
abstract: Chinese authorities bar GlaxoSmithKline finance executive Steve Nechelput from leaving country while they carry out investigation into bribery and corruption at the British firm; he has not been detained or prevented from traveling or working in China.
lead_paragraph: Steve Nechelput, a British finance executive, has not been detained or prevented from traveling or working in China, but a person involved in the case says he is prohibited from leaving the country.

headline.main: China Bars GlaxoSmithKline Executive From Leaving During a Bribery Inquiry
headline.print_headline: China Bars GlaxoSmithKline Executive From Leaving During a Bribery Inquiry
